name: Ghirardelli Square Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of San Francisco, within walking distance to Ghirardelli Square, Fisherman's Wharf and Pier 39.
wifi: Free high-speed WiFi in all rooms and public areas.
poolAndSpa: Indoor pool, outdoor hot tub, and spa facilities.
climateControl: Individual climate control in each room.
recentReview: Beautiful hotel with excellent service and amazing views of the Golden Gate Bridge.
cancellation: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in.
familyFriendly: Family-friendly amenities, including a children's playroom.
petPolicy: Pet-friendly hotel, allowing pets up to 25 lbs with a fee.
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to major attractions and the airport.
parking: Valet parking available for $50 per night.
safetyAndSecurity: 24/7 security surveillance in all areas of the hotel.
specialOffers: Special offers available for extended stays and holiday packages.
ambianceAndDecor: Luxurious and elegant decor with a modern twist.
environmentalInitiatives: Green certified hotel with energy-saving initiatives.
businessAmenities: Business center and meeting rooms with high-tech facilities.
viewAndSurroundings: Stunning views of the San Francisco Bay and the city skyline.
noiseLevel: Soundproof rooms for a peaceful stay.
